name: Hound Heist
description:
Hound Heist is a game by Team Monki Flip, pulling inspiration from games like Hotline Miami, Payday 2 and Animal Crossing. You play as a dog robbing banks run by evil, corrupted mafia cats and their minions (also cats). You shoot and bonk your way through the banks, stealing as much money and gold as you can!

Move with WASD, dash with left shift, aim with your mouse, shoot with the left mouse button, melee with the right mouse button, and switch your gun by pressing the mouse wheel button.
